## About The geeky dude in the group, an artist in his solitude. A young ambitious boy from the small city of Bhubaneswar, Abinash Senapati chooses to remain quiet and calm most of the time. Sometimes you can see a lazy sloth sleeping all the day in his uncomfortable bed, procrastinating. Oh, that's him! He rejoices making his mental repository more diverse and informative. He is currently in his final year of graduation in the department of Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering in Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. Currently an active developer at Apertium, coala and gitmate organisations. In the past, he has been a mentor for coala organisation in Google Code-in, 2017 edition. Just scroll down to read more !!! Believe me, I won't bore you for a moment. To see what I am upto, follow my github handler Techievena!!!!
